title: Realtime Java and AI #7
description:
Dive into the fascinating world of Generative AI, Apache Cassandra, and the seamless integration of OpenAI with Java technology.

This week, Mary Grygleski and Aaron Ploetz are joined by CÃ©drick Lunven to discuss how GenAI frameworks like Cassio can make your life easier and more "intelligent."
